summary: Go on a brain-twisting journey through a colorful galaxy of planets based on the magic cube. You'll have to twist and turn whole planets and solve tricky puzzles.

name: Curiosity
summary: A simple world where the player is able to change things that are not supposed to be changed. Welcome to Curiosity, the game where you can hack. Try out different hacks, get creative, entertain yourself! And hey, maybe you'll find a secret or two along the way!

name: Cubeverse
summary: Cubeverse is a 3D puzzle game, where you can play with your favorite cube puzzles in one place

name: Cube 332
summary: Cube 332 - fascinating runner. In which, you need to get from point A to point B, using only the mouse and one button. Simple, is not it?

name: Cube Defender 2000
summary: Laser bolts threatening your cube's existence? Let them come and render their petty attacks useless.

name: Cultist Simulator: The Dancer
summary:
In the occult cabaret that calls itself the Ecdysis Club, the distinction between pleasure and pain is as delicate and essential as the human skin. It is all that keeps us from making the very worst mistakes.

Pursue a career as a Dancer at the Club. Determine which parts of yourself to surrender. Cross oceans in pursuit of the ancient rites that beat in the Wood. Consider the ascensions that open to you. Choose carefully.

name: CubeTime
summary: You are a cube, and you need to move very quickly to geometric shapes and collect control points. The goal of the game is to hold out as much as possible in time and collect more control points.

name: Cuboid Keeper
summary: To be rewarded with the forbidden secret, one must first defeat a powerful being known as the Guardian of the Cube. You are the Guardian. The secret of the Cube is under your protection !

name: Cubanoids
summary: Cubanoids is a hardcore, cooperative, ultra fast, infinite play arena-based shooter providing an exceptional close-quarter battlefield experience.

name: Cute Puzzle
summary: Brain training in a little free time! The basic rule is simple, same as Minesweeper. When the panel opens, sexy images are displayed.

name: Cute Puzzle MAX
summary: Brain training in a little free time!The basic rule is simple, same as [Minesweeper].When the panel opens, sexy images are displayed.

name: Cursed Mansion
summary: Cursed Mansion is a horror adventure RPG that focuses on nuances and eerie feelings which happens throughout the adventure.

name: Cult of the Glitch King
summary: A 2D horror adventure with predominant puzzle and minor stealth and survival elements centered on mysterious occult & sci-fi themes.

name: Cute(Hard)Puzzle
summary: This is kind of simple puzzle but it's not kind. It is possible to make it easy, but I think there's no mean. I believe yours can solve it.

name: Cubic Factory
summary: Design and build your own factory within this 3D voxel-based strategy game. Research to unlock new buildings and transport methods and move your factory to the next age. Create and design themed worlds with their own resources, products and end goals.

name: Cut & Run
summary: Cut & Run is an arcade adventure game where you run around the city cutting everything and anything ranging from an alarm clock to an entire building.

name: Cube Defense
summary: You left alone camping in the mountains ... But during this time a virus has invaded the country and a cubic horde is heading towards you!

name: Cube Mission
summary: Cube mission is a fun isometric action platforming puzzler. Travel through a floating world with all kinds of different obstacles and precarious puzzles. This journey can be enjoyed by anyone looking for an amusing, challenging and rewarding adventure.

name: Cube Defender
summary: Build turrets and destroy wave after wave of cube enemies in this minimalist and addictive tower defence game. Battle it out with a bunch of cube enemies and blast them off the map with a range of unique turrets.

name: Cubians : Combine
summary: Combine and defend! Cubians: Combine is a defense game that uses small and cute Voxel Soldier Cubian to block enemies. It's a fantastic world created from the charming characters made with Voxel and the unique atmosphere, and the individuality of Cubian who can make various things through assembly.

name: Cursed Puppetry
summary: Cursed Puppetry is a Toy-Shooter from the perspective of a toy figure.You play as a toy figure in a world where normally Humans live. You will feel like an Ant when you see how big a Computerscreen or a Chair really is!Very fast game! You´ll need to swap your weapons on the fly. Stay tuned, add us to your wishlist.

name: Cute Adventure
summary: Cute Adventure is a multiplayer shoot game. Players will control the vibrant young characters, bring their own weapons to travel around adventure, defeat evil forces, maintain justice.Games are casual shooting games, I believe you can have fun!

name: Cuthbert in the Jungle
summary: Poor Cuthbert is in trouble again. He failed to overcome the Moronians (See Cuthbert Goes Walkabout and Cuthbert Goes Digging), so he has been sent to the jungle, where his troubles are many. He must fight his way through the jungle collecting treasures, jumping pits and swinging across alligators whilst being aware of the killer scorpion in the basement. High speed arcade action game. Full colour graphics. Machine Code. Joystick required.

name: CubeRace
summary: CubeRace is a fast paced competition game with unique gameplay. A 3D racing game set in 2168, on the Saturn Moons, where you have to race on a cube-shaped vehicle with no gravity, no brakes and no accelerator! Compete with other players by challenging them on Leaderboards.

name: CupGuess
summary: This is a casual game of guessing cups, you will play with a beautiful girl. If you guess wrong, she will not develop the following story with you, so in order to enhance the relationship with her, you need to keep your eyes wide open and guess every story correctly.

name: Cursor - by Mr iLyn.
summary: Train your reaction and dodge skills and try to get as much score as possible!

name: Cube Man
summary: Cube Man is a small man in a cube format, an adventurous man who does not rule out a challenge, in an ordinary day of training, upon arriving in his village, his friends were mysteriously abducted by beings from other planets, the Cube Man mission is to rescue his friends who were abducted.

name: Cube Human
summary: Cube Human is a cooperative adventure game，the city is the main stage of the cube Human.

name: Curious Expedition 2
summary: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

name: Current
summary: Current is a puzzle game for a couple of hours, where you have to bring all the platforms one level.

name: Cubicity: Slide puzzle
summary: Buddy, you’re in the cubic world! It has its own laws and rules, so choose a character and start solving the puzzles!Make up a figure from the characters, leading each of them the shortest way!

name: Curious Cases
summary: For Desktop or VR! In this 3 chapter story, you play as a modern day legend, Detective Thomas Moore. He has solved more cases than one can count, where others hit dead-ends, he gets to work.

name: Cure Hunters
summary: In the year 2078 a mysterious meteorite hit the surface of the earth. The impact caused the meteorite to release a virus which infected most of earth's population. General "Vaccinez" quickly formed a squad of Cure Hunters who set out to find an antidote.

name: Cube Master
summary:
Cube Master, seemingly simple platformer with a cubic design, the task of which is the passage of the rooms. 
 
You have to go 5 locations, each of which is unique and is not similar to the others, each location has 10 levels, challenging levels, which will seem to you sometimes impassable, but even more so for 10 seconds, which are given on each level.

name: Cursed Soul
summary:
Cursed Soul is an puzzle, adventure and horror game in First-Person camera. 
The game is being developed by solo developer Álvaro Rodríguez Ortiz (Wiwo) in Barcelona (Spain)

name: Cultist Simulator: Anthology Edition
summary:
This bundle includes:

- Cultist Simulator (all 110,000+ words of it)
- The Dancer DLC (peel off your skin at an occult cabaret!)
- The Priest DLC (martyr yourself in the name of St Agnes!)
- The Ghoul DLC (consume the dead, and paint in memory!)
- Cultist Simulator’s soundtrack (let the Mansus ooze into your ears)

name: Curves
summary: "Curves" is inspired by the winter sports skeleton. Try to make the difference in milliseconds on the track.

name: Cult 2112
summary: Cult 2112 - game about hero, who decided to challenge the forces of a mysterious sect.

name: Cube DOA
summary: Free first person puzzle/platforming experience.

name: Cubico
summary: A unique and experimental game mechanic. An open world awaits the player and offers challanges and pushing rythms.

name: CUBG: Car unknown battlegrounds
summary: New survival by battle cars of war with many guns in battleground royal 3D pixel

name: Cubed
summary: Inspired by Minecraft parkour, Cubed is a casual indie platformer about speeding through the sky across cubes.

name: Cursed One
summary: Cursed One - story-driven horror in Fantasy setting. Hoping to find a cure for an incurable disease, you entered a crypt, that according to legend, can fulfill a wish. Uncover the secrets of this place and be rewarded.

name: Curse of the Sea Rats
summary: Embark on an epic, hand-animated, ‘ratoidvania’ adventure, where your crew has been turned into rats by a pirate witch! Explore a rich non-linear world, enjoy fun action platforming, face challenging bosses, and unlock unique abilities - either alone or in local co-op!

name: Cures & Curios
summary: Cures & Curios is a virtual reality game for the HTC Vive. In the game, the player works in a medicine show cart in the Weird Old West, full of ingredients and tools. Players will concoct potions and elixirs, barter and trade with customers, and perform acts of magic.

name: Cult
summary: Chosen to be sacrificed. A kidnapped girl must use her wits and strength to escape a cult of demon worshipers.

name: CuBB
summary: CuBB is a casual runner game where you absorb the colors of the platforms you land on. If you fall you will die. Can you complete all the 5 stages?

name: Cult of the Abyss
summary: Cult of the Abyss is a cute-horror-survival-sandbox. You and your Dog against the world. A whimsical broken world ruled by a dark apocalyptic cult. Search for loot, explore and survive. Build your own hideouts, protect and defend them to not get overrun by the eerie creatures that hunt you at nighttime.

name: CupCakoon
summary: An Indie 2D game about a CupCake that must jump through clouds!

name: Curse of Anabelle
summary:
Curse of Anabelle is a story driven adventure-horror/puzzle game which players can experience in the first person perspective. The storyline is based on real world myths and legends. 
 
Curse of Anabelle offers a new take on the adventure/horror genre while being connected to real-world legends. In this adventure, Nathan will uncover a mystery that dates back to 10th century B.C. and face dark forces even that are even older than the Earth itself.

name: Cuthbert Enters the Tombs of Doom
summary: Maze game in which you avoid the monsters and find the treasures.

name: Cuties Dungeon
summary: Welcome to Cutie’s Dungeon! Meet Cutie, A dark and demented rabbit hellbent on destroying everything that’s cute! Cutie is out for revenge and won’t stop until he has ended the never-ending cycle of cuteness happening around him.

name: Culdcept DS
summary: Culdcept DS is an enhanced port of Culdcept, released on the Nintendo DS in 2008 and published by Sega.

name: Curse of Aros
summary:
Curse of Aros is an exciting online RPG where you can fight monsters, discover and use items, battle other players and steal their gold, or simply chat with the community in real-time.

Fight creatures, from weak bats all the way to the strong imprisoned Ice Demon. Collect items, gather resources (such as by mining), or team up and obtain rare items from strong foes. Complete tasks for bonuses or simply hang out with people in the town square. The world is yours to discover!

name: Cultist Simulator: The Priest
summary:
A quiet suburban parish needs a new priest. Perhaps this might finally be the one who shows them the Way. Though their doctrines might be considered peculiar, their faith cannot be denied.

Follow the path of Knock and serve your Disciples, both master and mastered. What is mortification of the flesh, set against those glorious visions of St Agnes? What the pain of this fleeting world against immortality as Martyr of the Keys?.

name: Cultist Simulator: The Ghoul
summary:
A disgraced medium. A gallery without windows. An elixir which permits the most final of feasts. A gnawing hunger which cannot be denied. All reflected in the snow-coloured eyes of Miss Naenia, gentlest of the Elegiast's Names.

Dig in cemeteries. Desecrate tombs. Consume the dead to unearth their secrets or commemorate them. Comfort or betray the living. Eternize the lost Hours in the Palest of Paintings. Just be careful to feed your hunger before it grows beyond you.

name: Cumulus
summary: Cumulus is a 2D puzzle Tetromino game with a twist. Drop tetromino blocks to fill in concentric circles. Once filled the ring will disappear, the higher level rings will fall down and you will gain points! Get as many points as you can!

name: Curzon Line
summary: Curzon Line is an open world story-driven video game, depicting the events unfolding in the immediate aftermath of nuclear war.

name: Curse of the Dead Gods
summary:
You seek untold riches, eternal life, divine powers - it leads to this accursed temple, a seemingly-infinite labyrinth of bottomless pits, deadly traps, and monsters.

Your greed will lead you to death, but that is not an escape. Rise to fight again. Delve deeper again. Defy the malignant deities that linger in this place. Battle through hordes of enemies in dark, cavernous passages filled with traps and secrets of all sorts - fire-spewing statues, explosives, hidden spikes, and worse.

Collect mystical Relics and an arsenal of weapons to make yourself unstoppable. Corruption builds in you with every step - encourage or ignore it, but each powerful curse can be a double-edged sword.

- A skill-based roguelike exploring a cruel, dark temple made of endless rooms and corridors
- Swords, spears, bows, guns - wield these and many more
- Unique curses influence each attempt, putting a twist on every action
- Dozens of enemies, with powerful champions and deadly bosses to face off against

name: Curse of the Dungeon
summary: You have to explore amazing places to get to the secret secrets of your soul.

name: CubeParkour
summary: A simple parkour-platformer to have some fun and pass time. You are a cube and you have to get from point A to point B as creatively as possible. That's it. There are 100 levels at the moment.

name: Cursed Pagoda
summary: Classic Freecell Solitaire combined with the unique story of a mysterious tower filled with traveling spirits! Play through more than 250 stages to unlock the memories of those trapped inside. Plus an Unlimited Freecell Mode!

name: Cubeland VR
summary: Collect, throw and avoid bombs! Multi-play casual shooting game with your basic moves, full of action but still easy to play.

name: Cucumber Defense VR
summary: Because of the abuse of fertilizer hormones, many mutant pests appeared on the planet, sweeping the whole planet of fruits and vegetables. And your vegetable garden will be their next goal. You now have the fate of the whole planet in your hands. grab up your weapons and protect the final fruits.

name: Cut Smash Wrap
summary: Destroy blocks using the combinations of the famous Rock, Paper, Scissors game! Smash scissors blocks using rock blocks, cut paper with scissor and wrap the rocks! Match 3 or 5 blocks to multiply your score!

name: Cube Smash
summary: Now with Halloween option and angry pumpkins! Stop the cube aliens flying out of the portal and trying to escape to the universe.

name: Cube Chase
summary: Challenge your reflexes, navigate obstacles, dodge guards and pass checkpoints to unlock new areas and reach the glowing golden cube.

name: Cutish
summary: Real-time 3D first-person adventure game

name: Cursed Gem
summary: Help Oliver in this retro-pixel and challenging platformer. Explore a cursed cave, full of traps, secrets and diamonds. Complete all levels, get the biggest diamond for your girlfriend and break the curse that is dooming you.

name: Cubeka
summary: CUBéKA is a new type of "pen and paper" word puzzle. Each Cubeka puzzle has a single word as a solution.

name: Cube Course
summary: A simple, yet fun 2D platformer. Get from point A to point B without hitting a spike and dying. Collect coins along the way to unlock features that change the atmosphere, difficulty and feeling of the game. If you like those old games that aren't to complicated and complex, you'll love this.

name: Cubic Chess
summary: Cubic Chess is a twist on traditional Chess, setting the pieces onto a 3d cubic board, you can rotate, revolve and plan around the board itself and is perfect for players that want a new way to think of their favorite game, without too many more bells and whistles.

name: Cuyo
summary: Cuyo is a relaxing, small platformer. Relax and play with relax mode or take a small challenge in normal mode.

name: Curse of Eternity
summary: A hardcore Action RPG with diverse combat and feats-based multi-classing. Start as one of three hero builds and either continue to specialize, or branch out and make your build your own. Slice, shoot, and zap your way through a dystopian world and fulfill your own deific journey.

name: Cube Escape Collection
summary: In this classic point-and-click adventure anthology you follow the path of Dale and Laura and other famous Rusty lake characters such as Mr. Crow and Mr. Owl. The series will be updated, preserved and bundled to survive the end of the Flash Games era.

name: Cube Escape: Paradox - Chapter 2
summary: Chapter 2 of Cube Escape Paradox - enjoy more challenging puzzles, a new storyline with a different ending and more Rusty Lake. Cube Escape: Paradox will be released together with the accompanying Paradox: A Rusty Lake Film.

name: Cuadradito y Circulito: El Videojuego
summary: Cuadradito and Circulito is a 2d platform game based on the web series of the same name.

name: Cubesc: Dream of Mira
summary:
Guide Mira through this journey of joyful puzzles to help her brother Kira in her dreams. 
 
 
Cubesc: Dream of Mira presents a brand new minimalist puzzle experience set in a fantastic 
 
atmosphere. 
 
 
Find hidden paths to awaken Kira from his nightmares through completing the puzzles. 
 
 
A STANDALONE ADVENTURE 
 
Completely new story from the Cubesc universe. You don’t need to have previously played Cubesc to enjoy Cubesc: Dream of Mira 
 
 
BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED PUZZLES 
 
Enjoy new interactions between cubes and characters and explore the changing dynamics 
 
 
LIVE BACKGROUND ATMOSPHERE 
 
Discover time and weather change while playing the game. 
 
 
MUSIC 
 
Unique melodies and musics.

name: Cu-On-Pa BS Ban
summary: Cu-On-Pa BS Ban is a Downloadable game for the Satellaview that was broadcast in at least 2 runs between June 29, 1997 and December 19, 1998. Between its first broadcast and August 2, 1997, a related magazine entitled Cu-On-Pa BS Ban Seiseki Magazine was broadcast alongside Cu-On-Pa.

name: Cube Rampage
summary: Hit the cube to get all the items on the levels.

name: Cubefall
summary:
Rotate the square to catch the falling cubes! Clear rows by catching blocks in every column. 
 
Be careful, rotating a tower into a falling block causes the tower to absorb the block. If a tower gets too big, it's game over. 
 
Features 2 modes, 3 difficulties, and over 20 color palettes! 
 
Use WASD/Arrows, Space, and Esc to navigate menu, and A/D or Left/Right arrows to rotate the base in-game

name: Cuckoo Castle
summary:
Cuckoo Castle is a mini-metroidvania made for the 4th edition of the#gbjam . In Cuckoo Castle you take control of a lonely knight seeking to defeat the evil force that resides in the Cuckoo Castle, an enormous castle that appeared out of nowhere.

Rescue new heroes and battle your way to the highest tower of the Castle.

name: Cupid Parasite
summary:
Sent to the Human Realm on her heavenly mission of “matchmaking”, Lynette meets her biggest challenge yet: the infamous Parasite 5. In order to help these five hopeless men find true love, Lynette and her team concoct the perfect matchmaking plan… REALITY TV.

Will Lynette be able to live up to her name as top bridal advisor and Cupid, or will her dreams get cancelled?

name: Culdcept II
summary: Culdcept Second is a turn-based strategy video game for the Dreamcast. It is the sequel to the Saturn title Culdcept.

name: Curved Space
summary: Curved Space is an intense arcade shooter about battling cosmic energy spiders across warped, physics-defying battlefields. Space stations and asteroids curve and loop around themselves. Up? Down? Who needs those when you’ve got a spaceship, guns and swarms of bugs to blast?

name: Cuccioli Cerca Amici
summary: Artù is a puppy who is always looking for new friends. By helping other dogs in the park or completing challenges, they can join him. The game includes six characters in total: Artù, Ginger, Pierre, Asia, Guenda, and Heidi. It also features 10 minigames divided into three categories: action, pastime, and care.

name: Curry House CoCo Ichibanya: Kyou mo Genki da! Curry ga Umai!!
summary: A cooking and restaurant management game featuring the popular Japanese curry restaurant chain CoCo Ichibanya.

name: Cubers: Arena
summary: SLASH, SMASH, SUMMON and BOUNCE your way to freedom & glory in this electrifying arena brawler/twin-stick slasher. Choose from over 100 unique weapons and skills to fight off waves of enemies. Defeat them all and dominate the leaderboard with the highest score!

name: CuberPunk 2089
summary: CuberPunk 2089 - A game with an open world in a cubical style from the first person! At your disposal the whole city of the future Cube City with a huge bunch of tasks and Easter eggs!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2
summary: Custom Order Maid 3D2 is an adult game released by KISS, and a sequel to Custom Maid 3D2. An all ages version titled Custom Order Maid 3D2 It's a Night Magic is available on Steam.

name: Cubia
summary: CUBIA is a relaxing 3D puzzle platformer set in an atmospheric world, where the ground rotates under your feet. Solve intriguing puzzles to save the world of CUBIA!

name: Cursery: The Crooked Man and the Crooked Cat
Cube Gothic
summary: Cube Gothic is a Story-driven Shoot 'em up Adventure. Shooting enemies and dodging projectiles while solving simple puzzles and trying to comprehend the surreal plot - these are the challenges you'll be facing in Cube Gothic.

name: Cube Raiders
summary:
Cube Raiders is a fun puzzle game for one or two players where you have to combine groups of dice using the energy of MagnetoGloves to solve puzzles.

Join Rose and Kirk in this head-breaking Cube Adventure and prove that you are a true Cube Raider.

name: CUE: Cards, The Universe and Everything
Cursed Treasure: Don't Touch My Gems!
Curse That Magic Cat!
summary: Magnus the Wizard has cursed you, turning you into a cat! Lift your curse and take your revenge by meowing, hiding, destroying things, and collecting spell books to break the spell. Curse That Magic Cat! is a lighthearted, single-player game made by students at SMU Guildhall.

name: Cultist Simulator: Initiate Edition
summary: Cultist Simulator is a game of apocalypse and yearning. Play as a seeker after unholy mysteries, in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Perhaps you're looking for knowledge, or power, or beauty, or revenge. Perhaps you just want the colours beneath the skin of the world.

name: Cursed to Golf
summary: Cursed to Golf is a golf-like adventure where every shot counts. Players are tasked with making it out of Golf Purgatory to become a Golfing Legend. With insane hazards, otherworldly power-ups and tons of replayability, will you make it back alive or will you forever be… Cursed to Golf!?

name: Cunsus Kart
summary: Cunsus Kart is a Singleplayer player Racing Game.

name: Cubey
summary: Cubey, is an Indie 3D Strategy type game where you try your best to avoid obstacles, if you even slightly touch them you start back from the beginning of the level.

name: Cube Projection
summary: This is a game that tests the imagination of three-dimensional space. Just find the projection of the cube in the front view and left view direction, and then clicks the corresponding grid above to pass the game.

name: Cubeventure
summary: Cubeventure is a simple game where you're moving using a cube and avoid obstacles. In this game you can find mechanics like buttons, moving objects, and more!

name: Curse of D'sparil
summary: Curse of D'Sparil is a 9-level episode released in January 2010, created by Kristian Käll; with the secret level designed by his brother Karl.

name: Cut the Rope Remastered
summary:
Wake up and smell the cake: today is Om Nom's Birthday! The world’s favorite sweet tooth is having a birthday party, and everyone’s invited!

Om Nom is back in the glorious 3D remaster of the legendary Cut the Rope puzzle game!

Cut ropes, avoid obstacles and use boosters to deliver candy to Om Nom, the little green monster that loves sweets. Addictively fun physics based-gameplay, an adorable main character and exciting adventures await. Join more than 1 billion players who enjoyed the original titles. And if you're an old fan, be ready for some some sweet new treats!

name: Curious George Comes Home
summary: Whether he's racing a sailboat, running errands in town or visiting the zoo, Curious George always manages to get himself in a bind. Now, that ever-so-mischievous monkey is in trouble again...and only you can help him!! This critically acclaimed CD-Rom invites children on a free wheeling romp through the friendly and familiar world of Curious George. By actively participating in an ever-changing story- choose places to go, characters to visit and things to do. Children learn storytelling and problem solving in a creative, fun-filled environment.

name: Cube Paste
summary: Cube Paste is a FPS in large scale maps using voxel destruction in dynamic environments.

name: Culot.io
summary: Culot.io is a multiplayer browser game combining general knowledge and dare.

name: Cuckold Simulator
summary: CUCKOLD SIMULATOR, the exciting new game where you play as Cuckold (that is his name) in his day-to-day life. Work hard, give all your money to the bull, and be verbally abused by your fat wife.

name: Cursed Blocks
summary: Cursed Blocks is a block-stacking game in which the game messes with you. It was built by a competitive block-stacking player with the primary goal of offering a new, refreshing, tough-but-fair challenge to those with a mastery of the basic block-stacking games.

name: Cupcake Match
summary: Help Joy in building her dream, a Cupcake Bakery. Discover all-new ways to play this wacky puzzle game. Find your perfect match with different breathtaking game modes that meet all your sweet desires. Cascades of fun, journey through over 100 challenging Quest puzzles, charge into the electrifying non-stop action, and tailor your experience for a revolutionary new way to relax. Enjoy the amazing sights and sounds and engage in endless cupcake-matching fun, and earn your way in building to the cupcake factory as you soar to dazzling new heights!

name: Curiosaurios Club: Un Viaje Espacial
summary: Space themed casual game for kids. On this game, Sami and Codi will travel trough Solar System discovering some curiosities about planets.

name: Curve Racer
summary: Curve Racer is an intense arcade racing game where you need to get the highest score possible. You can acquire an amazing score if you avoid any of the cars or obstacles that come in your way. The vehicle won’t stop, so all you can do is to guide it through all the perils as much as possible. The Curve Racer game brings in lots of cars to choose from, all of which pertain to specific categories. You get to customize your driving experience via numerous car upgrades, and you can also acquire map parts that will make browsing through the world a whole lot easier. Immerse yourself in a cool, fun racing experience only with Curve Racer! Features: Intense arcade racing Upgrade your cars and get map parts 4 game modes, free ride, time trial, single lane and dual lane Use boosters like coins, magnets, high speed or car parts Numerous missions to choose from It’s very easy to change environments!

name: Curling
summary: Whether you are a Curling fan or you want to discover a new sport game, you'll enjoy playing Curling in its one player game or local multiplayer game . Curling has beed designed to be as close as possible to reality while providing best gameplay.

name: Cute Triplets
summary: This is a horizontal action game. You can switch 3 characters freely, each character has its own different characteristics to cope with different situations.

name: Cube Flip
summary: A colorful and relaxing puzzle game with calming sounds and visuals.

name: Customers From Hell: Game For Retail Workers
summary: Third-person wave survival shooter where you protect your base, and eliminate annoying Karens that want to speak to the manager. Protect your supplies, build traps and construct your defenses. Eliminate all the annoying customers! This is your chance to get back at Karens for old' times sake.

name: Cute Honey 3
summary: This is a casual decryption type mini game. Players can draw various line segments in the game level to guide the water flow to the bottle to pass the level.

name: Cult of Dawn
summary: Attempt to survive as a mysterious event strips away the bounds of reality itself in Cult of Dawn, a third person horror adventure inspired by classic survival horror titles of the 90s and early 2000s. Featuring tank controls, fixed and over the shoulder camera angles, inventory management and more.

name: Cubey's Quest
summary: Cubey's Quest is a game i published on September 4th of 2020 by Tulenian Mapper. the game is a platformer and you quest through levels attempting to get to the end!

name: Curious Alice
summary: Experience a world created by illustrator Kristjana S. Williams as you follow your own personal White Rabbit companion, hunt for missing objects, solve the Caterpillar's mind-bending riddles, visit the Queen of Hearts’ croquet garden, and experience classic moments from this legendary tale.

name: Cut Them Up
summary: When life gives you endless hordes of infernal enemies, make a mess !

name: Cub Gym
summary: A challenging and fun crazy scavenger hunt game.

name: Cute Honey
summary: This is a casual game. The girl in the game has different CGs and a variety of costume props. There are two different forms on the cute girl. The secret hidden on the girl is waiting for you to discover.

name: Cute Dark Elves
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Cube Runner 2
summary: Cube Runner 2 is a 3d action platformer that's simple to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge even the greatest gamers.

name: Cube Worlds Survival
summary: Survive. Explore. Upgrade. Fight. An endless rogue like shooter RPG game.

name: Cuboid Bouncer
summary: Cuboid Bouncer is a 3D Side-Scroller video game that includes 12 levels with different challenges on each level. The player is called Cuboid (a cube like character) that must jump or bounce its way through the different obstacles.

name: Cube Clones
summary:
A 3D block puzzle with a beautiful world view that makes full use of "clone".
Immerse yourself in a fantastic world and immerse yourself in elaborate puzzles.

name: Cute Bite
summary: A vampire raising sim! Teach your Little Mistress skills and train her to hunt for blood so that she can regain her powers, save your life, and possibly take over the world...

name: Cube Jump 3D
summary:
Cube jumps where orange marker points.
Do not touch lava!
Press and hold for jump (Jump force is max 500)

name: Cube Blast: Match

Push your spatial thinking abilities to their limits, as you solve increasingly complex puzzles on a 3D tower of colorful blocks, with new and exciting mechanical twists popping up, just when you thought you saw all the game has to offer. If you are not yet convinced: there are also aliens, and explosions!

name: Cute Animals Memory Card Game
summary: Match pairs of cards with pictures of cute animals. With two game modes.

name: Cursetorn
summary: Cursetorn is a strategic horror game where the player acts as a doctor treating a patient inflicted with a seemingly incurable curse. The game revolves around you and your patient, Kein, as they slowly succumb to the effects of the curse and lose their humanity.

name: Custodian: Beginning of the End
summary: Custodian: Beginning of the End is a brutal and difficult platformer designed for caution and reaction. Explore, seek secrets and collect mechanisms to become even stronger and meet the impending End!

name: Cultures 1+2

name: Cube

name: Cultures: Northland + 8th Wonder of the World

name: Cultist Simulator: The Exile

Disappear into the mists of the invisible world. Build a new, secret life elsewhere. Or choose defiance, and attempt the impossible.

name: Cube Full of Mines: Slate Map

name: Cubic Currency

name: Cube Crisis

name: Cursed Letters

name: Cultus
summary: Experience a young man's search for answers behind his nightmares as things take a dark turn, or play the unpredictable and nerve-racking multiplayer with friends in Cultus! A pixelated survival horror experience!

name: Cute Honey 2
summary: This is a casual water catching game. The girls in the game have different CGs and a variety of costumes and props. A new storyline and voice text have been added to the game. You can learn about the girls' stories through various clues. The secret hidden in the girl is waiting for you to discover.

name: Cube Shifter
summary: Move left and right to dodge obstacles. Attempt to beat levels or try and get the highest score.

name: Cube Paradox
summary: Cube Paradox is a retro platform game, go through the "single level" of the game as quickly as possible so that you can get a recording of it, or will the increasing obstacles prevent you from recording it?

name: Curse Lsland
summary: Try to survive on a mysterious island full of zombies!

name: Cubic Juice
summary: This is a game requiring both logic and strategy where the goal is to build solid layers of cubes without empty spaces using given figures with some certain shape. A player gets score with each built layer and this layer of cubes is removed from the matrix.

name: Curse of the Pharaoh: Tears of Sekhmet
Curtain
summary:
CURTAIN is an interactive first-person narrative about Kaci & Ally, two queer women in a Glasgow punk band, which gives you a first hand experience of their destructive relationship.

Players embody Ally coming home to their apartment after a successful gig as Kaci, your partner, watches and comments on every thought and action, creating an overwhelming, stifling atmosphere

It takes about half an hour to finish, the game will exit itself.

name: Cuccchi
summary: Cuccchi is a game where you explore beautiful dioramas and go through dangerous and trippy labyrinths, in a journey inside the paintings of Enzo Cucchi.

name: Curly Monkey
summary: You play as a monkey that has to jump from platform to platform, while simultaneously collecting items and shooting at enemies with a boomerang. This is an unlicensed game that is a clone of NES hardware.

name: Curly Monkey 2
summary:
The sequel to the first title; the gameplay premise is the same, but it is faster paced and has higher quality graphics. There are also portals that can take you to new areas.

Curly Monkey 2 is a chinese plug-and-play game, Most known by My Arcade. Exclusive to the Gamer V Portable and Go Gamer. and possibly to many more My Arcade products.

name: Cuttlemania!
summary: Two-player only game in which your cuttlefish has to colour in the squares so many times to win.

name: Cube-e

name: Cute animal jigsaw puzzle

name: Curing Covid

name: Cubecois

name: Custom Machinery

name: Cube Space

name: Cursed House 9: Match 3 Puzzle

name: CubePuzzle

name: Cupcake: an Apartment Adventure
summary: A short but sweet game. You are a baker living in Sugarlake apartment complex. On a whim, you made some cupcakes and now the only question left is what to do with them Explore the halls of Sugarlake apartment complex, meet your fellow tenants and decide the fate of these 6 delicious cupcakes.

name: Cubiya
summary: Cubiya is a 3D puzzle game, where you are asked to think around the box. You play as a small astronaut who is trying to rebuild a world. Run around chunks of the planet to find and build beacons, and reconnect the broken world. Explore different chunks of the world solving puzzles along the way.

name: Cultic
summary: You died? So what? Tuck your guts back in and gear up to fight your way through the ranks of a mysterious and twisted cult. You, your guns, and your dynamite will have to shoot, slide, blast, duck, dodge, and maybe throw a gib or two to survive in this old-school-inspired shooter.

name: Curses
summary: Curses is a cute and darkly comedic game about trauma, fantasies, vengeance, magic and healing. With the aid(?) of your cat you explore a variety of emotional responses to trauma and face the ethical question: to curse or not to curse.

name: Cuboy Back to the Cubeture: Era 1
Cult of the Lamb
summary: Cult of the Lamb casts players in the role of a possessed lamb saved from annihilation by an ominous stranger, and must repay their debt by building a loyal following in his name. Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland worshippers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

name: Cube Dancer
summary: Cube Dancer is a short VR rhythm game, that puts you in dance battles against mysterious opponents. Each with its own unique dance style. Study their moves. Hit all the cubes that are thrown at you. And become the best cube dancer of them all.

name: Cube-e 2
summary: 2D shooter about robots for one and two players, made in stylish hand-drawn graphics.

name: Curling on Line

name: Cutthroat Cove
summary: Welcome to Cutthroat Cove. Get ready to pillage and plunder, or be prepared to walk the plank. In this open world pirate thriller you can craft, engage in combat with the nasty locals, and follow clues to unlock the secrets of the Old World.

name: Cube Runk
summary: Cyberpunk adventure game about the fight of a orphan Drew against powerful corporations.

name: Cubo ao Topo
summary: "Cubo ao topo" is a strategy game played in the Twitch channel chat.

name: Cubiscape 2
summary: Solve hundreds of fun and challenging puzzles in this original turn-based puzzle game. Hide from your enemies or lure them into traps, press buttons to open up new paths or skip obstacles using the teleporter!

name: Cube Conflict
summary: Cube Conflict is a free and open-source FPS where smileys are at war without mercy. If you see a Ninja firing a nuclear missile at a Priest with a GAU-8 in power armor, it's totally normal in this game!

name: Cubox: Awakening of Gods
summary: 3D blocky MMORPG open-world game. Build castles with friends, discover new biomes, new monsters and resources. Craft Items and upgrade equipment. Find new cities

name: Cure Obsession
summary: This is a stress relieving game

name: Custam Sugoroku
summary: A game of dice where you can create your own inside. Create your own map and save it to a file. Load the saved file and play with others.

name: Cubelz: Cars
summary: Heat at full throttle and a new system through the points. That is the motto of the DLC "Cubelz Cars". Let yourself be seduced by lovingly designed levels and heat up between obstacles.

name: Cubiscape 2: First Expansion Pack
summary: Several new puzzle elements and a ton of new levels - this expansion pack improves on nearly everything that makes the game fun!

name: CurryKitten FPV Simulator

name: Curse of Dragor
summary:
Curse of Dragor is a single-player, role playing game similar to Dungeon Master, Eye of the Beholder and the like.

The story takes place in Xorinth which lies in waste after being cursed by the banished Prince Dragor. The player ventures out with the goal of restoring the land to its former glory.

The main character will be joined by 3 others to form a 4-person party. Characters level up as they gain experience while fighting off monsters with medieval weapons (swords, daggers, flails and more). The game boasts that there are "5,000 locations to explore and more than 500 objects to examine."

name: CubeCube
summary: CubeCube is a third person perspective action game. You can compose and change the attack action with your own style. Face the powerful enemy and discover the truth of CubeCube's awaken.

name: Cute Dragon Yongyong
summary: a simple but difficult puzzle game

name: Curse of Disaster Spirit: Anecdotes of Mansion

name: Cursed Night: The House

name: Cupid Parasite: Day One Edition
summary:
Welcome to Cupid Corporation! - Located in the glitzy and trendsetting metropolis of Los York, Cupid Corporation is a daring marriage agency known for its style and success rate.

Our heroine, Lynette Mirror, is Cupid Corporation's top bridal advisor, whose job is to consult in-vogue singles to make their wildest romantic dreams come true! BUT she has one huge secret up her sleeve-she is none other than Celestia's Goddess of Love, Cupid!

Sent to the Human Realm on her heavenly mission of "matchmaking", Lynette meets her biggest challenge yet: the infamous Parasite 5. In order to help these five hopeless men find true love, Lynette and her team concoct the perfect matchmaking plan... REALITY TV.

Will Lynette be able to live up to her name as top bridal advisor and Cupid, or will her dreams get cancelled?

Day 1 Edition

Nintendo Switch Game (with reversible cover sleeve)
6 Trading Cards
Sticker Sheet
Double-Sided A2 Poster
Collector's Box

Unique gameplay. Rotate the world to discover new path combinations and further connections.
Find the right twist to get through these visually confounding worlds.
Steer CuBuGo on the right path to the finish, move after move, without eliminating the charging animals blocking your way.
But watch out for falling garden gnomes, voracious robots, flame-throwing pipes and rotating knives.
Each move must be well thought out to complete a level, collecting all bonuses on the way.

One of the world’s fastest and most interesting
Top view racing game.
By using an immediate responsive control
You can change lanes rapidly.
It’s a thrilling and amazing game.
Someone may have never started the game
But no one has done it just once if started it.
That much,
It is a very addictive game

Swap cards to create poker hands, plan your matches to clear each board, fortify your deck with glorious boons, break any curses inflicted upon you, and test your fate in a variety of special events!

name: Cubes of Death

name: Cu-Blit

Follow the journey of a small worker robot using the last of its battery to control other robots, recharge, teleport and build pathways to the head console and reboot the city back to its original self.

name: Cupid Island

As a Cupid, you'll discover many different couples and help their love stories. Build, customize, and expand the Island using the Love, Joy, and Passion produced by the lovely residents.

name: CubeLines

name: Cubey's Adventure

In addition you can play snooker with six balls, 10 balls or 15 balls ruleset. Play against the computer controller oppponent or your friends in some relaxing or exciting matches.

name: Cursed Town

name: Cursed

name: Cursed Blood
summary: Cursed Blood - This is a slasher with RPG elements, in a medieval setting, with a dark and gloomy atmosphere.

name: Cursed Fables: White as Snow - Collector's Edition
summary: A fable unlike any other...

name: Cultist Simulator: The Lady Afterwards
summary: "Cherchez la femme, the saying goes. But what does the lady look for?"The Lady Afterwards is a story-centric TRPG for 2-8 players set in the world of double-BAFTA-nominated Cultist Simulator.

name: Curley Laboratory
summary: In a facility, scientists are creating a vaccine called "The Red Vine" but it becomes unstable. It causes a breach with unknown Anomalies. You must find an exit to escape the laboratory from the creatures around you in the dark. Are you brave enough to survive?

name: Cursed 2
summary: Search a desolate town for traces of your childhood friend. A point&click adventure with action combat.

name: Curtain Call
summary: "Curtain Call" is a visual novel about (literally) breaking through social masks by forming meaningful connections with incredibly deep personalities. Whether you’re looking to make new friends or something more, there’s a whole cast of characters just dying to meet you!

name: Cursed Dungeon Raider
summary: Embark on an exploration adventure with spooky and horror elements, tasked with recovering real historical artifacts from excavation sites around the world. Beware of local traps and monsters inspired by the mythology of each region.

name: Cursed Castilla
summary:
In Cursed Castilla, one takes the role of Don Ramiro, a knight appointed by King Alphonse VI, to fight and banish the evil invading the lands of Tolomera.
Don Ramiro will face mouras, Ojáncanos, Nuberus and Malismos: creatures from the European folklore, as well as from chivalric romances such as Amadís de Gaula. For that, one will use a different range of weapons to defeat the enemies, in a pure classic arcade action style.

name: Cubix: Match-3
summary:
Over 1,000 levels can vary from 2 to 4 colors for the cubes to cycle through, challenging your abilities by increasing their difficulty even further!
And there's more! Cubix also includes 5 different special cubes that introduce new challenges that fully change the approach you must take to solve a level perfectly. Don't forget to complete 60+ achievements with hilarious pop culture references!
Want to build your own levels? Cubix comes with a level editor, where you can test and save new levels!

name: CuteBoy.TD
summary:
This is the three-dimensional tower defense you have never played. Each level is full of characteristics, simple and interesting! At present, the first season is launched.
Powerful skill system: properly help soldiers upgrade their skills, which will greatly improve their attack power.

name: Cupid Kiss
summary: Use your logical thinking to help the couple slide their way to find each other in this relaxing and innovative puzzle. Just be careful not to let any imp get in the way of love.

name: Cubegrid
summary: Cubegrid is an addicting puzzle game with lots of puzzling fun. The perfect pastime gaming experience for anyone who loves tricky brain teasers and strategy. A puzzle game perfect against boredom for children as well as adults.

name: Cultures: 8th Wonder of the World
summary: "Cultures: 8th Wonder of the World" is part of the widely popular RTS game series "Cultures" and the successor of the well-known and successful "Cultures 2 - The Gates of Asgard" and "Cultures: Northland". This adventure and strategy game will see you assuming the role of a Viking hero charged with saving humanity from the forces of evil.

name: Cuckoo Curling
summary: Curling with the rules of four in a row! A fun and surprising game of skill for everyone. Try to form a line, push your opponents, and most of all watch out for the crocodile.

name: Curro
summary: Curro is a first person shooter game. Set your record in the world generated endlessly.

name: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling
summary: Cupid Parasite: Sweet and Spicy Darling is a fandisc for Cupid Parasite.

name: Cubey's Adventures Classic
summary: Cubey's Adventures Classic is the original game in the Cubey's Adventures lineup of games. It's a retro-styled platformer game, with approx. 21 levels. This game, though not finished, was released as a standalone game on the Microsoft Store, later being released as a .zip file online. You play as a pink, happy cube, on a journey to defeat Lord Evilcube.

name: Cubey's Adventures Rewritten
summary: Cubey's Adventures Rewritten is a retro-styled platformer game, with 58 maps split across three "Map Packs": 20 in Classic Pack (Original maps from Cubey's Adventures Classic), 30 in Default Pack (The new levels for Cubey's Adventures Rewritten) and 8 in Precision Pack (An extremely hard pack added in an update).

name: Curious Expedition 2: Shores of Taishi
summary: The Shores of Taishi DLC features a brand new island type (the Celestial Shores) with new tile types, items, locations, enemies, recruitable characters and more.

name: Cute Fighter
summary: Released in 1998 by SemiCom, Cute Fighter is a sequel to SD Fighters, that aims to be even cuter!

name: Cute Cats 3
summary: Kittens come back to challenge you once again! Test your memory and attentiveness. Play a new chapter of the beloved puzzle game and find all differences in pictures with our cute fellas.

name: Custom Street World Tour
summary: Custom Street World Tour is an easy-to-install map pack for Fortune Street and Boom Street containing over a hundred custom boards from the Custom Street Board Repository, some including custom music and backgrounds.

name: Cut
summary: "Cut" is a story about the self, the protagonist will explore in a dark and dreamy world, cutting the plant that brings pain to this world - Ner.

name: Cursed Travels: Sunken City
summary: A dark puzzle game featuring intriguing mysteries, a unique artstyle, and skeletons. Platform your way through haunted forests, cursed ruins, dark mountains, and more, searching for the mythical Sunken City to solve its ancient puzzles.

name: Cute Waifu
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Cubiti Parti
summary: Competitive Online Party Game! Master fun minigames in real-time online multiplayer action against your friends!

name: Cute Train
summary: A simple puzzle where you have to guide a little cute train to the end of the line!

name: CubeLoop
summary: CubeLoop is a first-person puzzle game that you can play solo or cooperatively online. Will you be able to figure out what riddle is hidden behind each room? Or will you die and die in an endless loop? Only logic can save you.

name: Cursed Exped
summary: Take part in the first journey of the Cursed Exped. Your mission is to cleanse cursed items in a haunted house. Use your tools to locate and investigate items. Create a ritual area to mark your location of interest and bring items with energy there to progress through the game. Be careful though, the unknown is always watching you and waiting around every corner. Stay safe and happy investigating.

name: Cut to the Core
summary: How much of someone can you cut away before there's nothing left? Find out in this chilling kinetic visual novel - IF YOU DARE!

name: Cube Decider
summary: Cube Decider is a logic puzzle game with RPG elements where you need to make your way through each level collecting power-up and deciding whom and when to attack using your logic and arithmetic skills.

name: CubeShooter
summary: this is a tower defence game, character cant move,but you can choose your weapon,and your evolution way and get special result ， randomn map, random weapon and random enemies; we add some roguelite elements and character can get permanent upgrade.

name: Cultist Astronaut
summary: Blast through this cultic platformer as a space-faring cultist hellbent on purging the galaxy of heretics! Travel to hazardous planets across the cosmos and eliminate opposing cults with your eldritch blaster.

name: Cubit
summary: Cubit is an iOS game that resembles 3D sudoku. It was developed by ex-insomniac games employees.

name: Cubit
summary: The object of the game is to place pieces so that they form a row of four. The row may be in any direction, may cross the 'planes' to produce a row which for example goes from the bottom right corner to the top left corner. Play can be for two players or one person against the computer. When play is against the computer, the machine will use a sophisticated, fast logic search to produce a superb mental challenge.

name: Curseball
summary: Welcome To Curseball! Your goal: hit the ball before time runs out. Simple, right?

name: Cutie Tutti Frutti
summary: "Cutie Tutti Frutti" is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Cubiscape
summary: Original puzzle game. Amazing gameplay and stylish graphics! Play now!

name: Cute Kaizo World
summary:
Extremely easy and forgiving kaizo hack. Accessible to beginners, and hopefully nice for the average player to breeze through.

Mario has Reznorvations for dinner at the Castle, and you must help him get there.

I hope you have fun.

name: Cube

name: Curse of the Pharaoh: Napoleon's Secret
Cult of Babel

name: Cuphead & The Delicious Last Course

name: Cultivation Story: Reincarnation

name: Cuisineer
summary: Explore the world of Cuisineer as you enter dungeons and defeat monsters to get vital ingredients to cook delicious food to serve at your restaurant in this super cute and tasty rogue-lite dungeon crawler!

summary: Cube Chaos is a complex strategy rogue-lite about placing units to create giant armies, factories, combos, or self replicating murder crabs, overwhelming and surviving your opponents. Build and adapt new strategies each run using a ludicrous variety of units, perks and more.

name: Cult of the Sons
summary: Several young women were abducted in a London park. They have not been found again. Now the population is afraid that a serial killer is on the loose in London. It was rumoured that Jack the Ripper was back.

This epic, story-rich experience features hundreds of animated shots (mostly naughty ones), and a large world, filled with collectible treasures, booty calls, and an abundance of fun secrets and mysteries to uncover.

name: Cueist 2

Customizable tables, 8 selectable physics models (some serious, some not so much) and a wealth of opponents make this the perfect way to have a relaxing game of pool on your mobile device.

name: Curvature
summary: Take control of a highly adaptable battle machine and infiltrate a hostile civilization to keep peace in the universe. Build your own playstyle with a vast amount of gadgets, weapons and unique abilities. Survive and dominate a harsh and atmospheric world.

name: Cursed 3
summary: The epic conclusion of the CURSED trilogy.

name: Cube Adventure
summary: This minimalist game will help you pass the evening.

name: Cube Fight
summary: Cube Fight is a simple 2D shooter game that you can play and chill out with your friends. Here you can find abilities that will randomly spawn across the map and velocity-based player movement giving you a dynamic gameplay experience. What are you waiting for? Download the game and check it out by yourself!

name: Cube Farmer
summary: Cube Farmer is a puzzle game where your goal is making the plantation grow on the island. To do this you need to put the water cube in the correct position that is indicated in the archipelago and then go to the next island.

name: Cursed Broom

name: Cursed House 11
summary: Solve tricky Match3 levels, play bonus games and lift the curse!

name: Cuties Hacked: Oh No Someone Stole My Photos!
summary: Cuties Hacked is a new spin on the classic arcade formula of Xonix, that rewards your reflexes and skills with sets of beautifully crafted arts featuring some of the hottest girls you have ever seen.

name: Cursed Colors
summary: The book is cursed and you should stop the darkness within this arcade pixelated game.

name: Cubix Worlds
summary: Cubix Worlds is a free-to-play Multiplayer 2D Online MMORPG Sandbox Game. You can build awesome worlds with your friends, roleplay with them, farm, mine through caves, customize your character's style and your profile, earn cubix and spend them in the Shop & Marketplace!

name: Cubic Figures
summary: Cubic Figures is a minimalistic puzzle game where you need to make up different figures from a number of given shaped blocks. Take the block, rotate if needed and put it into the outlined figure to fill it. Repeat until all the blocks will be revealed.

name: Cuber
summary: This is a 3D Platform adventure that brings you across the cuber Multiverse. Try And complete the mission and Make the tough jumps so you can get to your reality.

name: Curious Expedition 2: Robots of Lux
summary: The exploration roguelike of Curious Expedition and the robotic pirates from SteamWorld Heist come together for the best collaboration of the industrial age.

name: Cursed Crew
summary: Cursed crew is a roguelike crew management game taking place on a 18th century ship in a fantasy setting. You control a captain that needs to keep the ship’s crew alive in a harsh world with environmental hazards, pirates, sea monsters and much, much more. Can you lift off the Curse?

name: Curse of Argion
summary: Curse of Argion is a randomly generated, rogue-like, dungeon crawler in which a small hero must climb a tower full of dangerous traps and enemies to fight a curse that threatens to infect the world of Argion.

name: Curl!
summary: The beloved and captivating sport is spreading to new worlds! Take up the broom to challenge your friends locally or online to a competition of wit, teamwork, and silliness in this first-of-its-kind game, built for accessibility with brain-computer interface integration.

name: Cubeism 2: Baroque Edition

name: Curse Removal Service
summary: Lift curses cast upon a cute latinx.

name: Cute Cock Clicker
summary: Poke sexy men with objects until they take their clothes off!

name: Curupira
summary: Curupira is an action platformer where you need to help restore the ecological balance and retrieve the energy spheres from the hands of the fearsome god Anhangá.

name: CubicBan
summary: CubicBan is a minimalistic Sokoban-based puzzle game where you need to move the cubes to their respective places. Use the triangle block to push the square blocks to the place with square sign in it.

name: CubeShot
summary: CubeShot is a fascinating first-person multiplayer shooter game with block graphics, in which you will enter a battlefield full of ruthless players. This free online game on offers you spectacular duels against other players, in the middle of a war zone to put your killer instinct to the test.

name: Curious Expedition 2 Bundle
summary: This bundle includes Curious Expedition 2 + all paid DLCs, expanding possibilities across the entire game, both in Campaign Mode and Director Mode.

name: Cursor0x0
summary: Cursor0x0 is a collection of various cursor mini games that require a good reaction, stamina, and precision. Fight enemies, win races, dodge bullets, complete different goals to unlock new challenge types and reach the final level!

name: Cursed Crops
summary: Play with up to 4 players as a group of conspiracy addict farmers as you defend farmlands built on haunted land from the cursed vegetables that rise during the harvest.

name: Cursed Pantsu
summary: Kaori is a good girl who always does the right thing. But one day, succumbed to temptation, she had stolen panties in the Mall... Cursed Pantsu is a story-driven action-adventure game with RPG and platforming elements about Kaori’s adventures in the Hellish Mall.

name: Custom Robo Arena Redux
summary:
A hack made to make Custom Robo Arena more balanced and more replayable.

Robo stats are extensively modified to be more balanced and more diverse. Robos that failed to create unique niches are overhauled (Ray Mk III, Sassy Stunners, Wild Soldiers, Trick Flyers, even Little Raiders) power differences exist in greater variety (and are given to the player in descriptions), stat divergence is increased between members of the same groups, weakening stat anomalies are fixed, and all robos have unique descriptions to tell you their strengths or about their robo class. See the readme, because nearly all robos have changed.

Overall the robo selection process should feel more open in viable options, and choosing within a robo class a more nuanced decision.

Certain weak guns (even Basic!) are made to be more usable, Gravity Gun and Burrow Bomb are fixed/nerfed, a new bomb is ready to be used, a new illegal robo and gun are present, and a few battles are now different.

NO DIRT. Battles do not get robos dirty!

No more slow start! Nearly all legal parts are buyable within the first 3 shops, including robos. Special Ray models are available at markup but you can also wait to get them cheaper on Encephalon Isle (or through the police missions as normal with X-Ray).

The main character also has an overworld palette change mostly to let you know the mod worked.

name: CustomBullet
summary: Endless customization and exhilarating robot action!Speed, power, size, all at your own will.An overwhelming sense of speed that runs through the body.Huge craters and concrete jungles create high-speed battles.Game for Robo-Game Fans.

name: Cute Fight
summary: Let's have a cute battle!

name: CubicTourPlus.
summary: With simple rules, a cool look, and players all over the world, Cubic Tour has now been updated extensively with new features!

name: Cult: Chapter One
summary: Find what you came for and escape, before they get what they want...

name: Cubether
summary: In Cubether, the jelly cubes must work together to pass a level. Each of the cubes moves in a different way and to get to some platforms you need to use the capabilities of another cube. The Cubether game is focused on discovering and therefore there is no tutorial on how to play and how to use a given element of gameplay.

name: Cubic Parking
summary:
Cubic Parking is a minimalistic parking based puzzle game where you need to move the double triangle block from right side of the field to the left.
There will be multiple blocks (one, two and three blocks shapes) on your way and you need to free the space by moving them. The directions you can move the block are limited and are indicated with arrows.
You can move the double triangle block only back and forward.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Cult of the Lamb casts players in the role of a possessed lamb saved from annihilation by an ominous stranger, and must repay their debt by building a loyal following in his name. Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland worshippers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

Cult of the Lamb: Deluxe Edition includes:
Nintendo Switch game cartridge or PlayStation 5 game disc.
An exclusive 104-page artbook in landscape format.
The game´s Official Soundtrack CD in a carton sleeve.
A Collectible tuck-in box housing all the contents.

name: Cuddly Forest Friends

A deck-building game in which your goal is to turn the villagers into your entourage.

Will they be loyal to you? Find out by playing cards and get them to worship you. Steal villages from other gods, sacrifice your own, and reach 100 minions. Become the most loved or feared god of all.

Turn-based game for 2 to 4 players.

name: Cube
summary: Cube did not come from anywhere, in fact, Cube created the universe as we know it, the only drawback is Cube could not manifest itself.. until now. Cube conjured up every last bit of his omnipotent strength and was able to manifest in this 8-bit game. It's not much, but it's the best we could do for now.

name: Cubob

name: Curse of the Cobra
summary:
When a strange pyramid suddenly appears, rumors begin to swirl - is the evil Cobra Queen rising once again?

Traveling to New York, London, and finally Cairo you'll need to befriend locals, bribe uncooperative animals, and flatter magical statues to gather clues and unravel this enigma.

But beware, shadowy figures lurk to impede your progress and time is running out. Can you solve the mystery before it's too late or will you become a victim of the Curse of the Cobra?

name: Cube
summary: Cube is a freeware 3D first-person shooter game. It can be played both in multiplayer and singleplayer mode. It allows the player to edit maps in-engine in full 3D, this means it is possible to fly around the map, point and drag to raise/lower blocks, create slopes etc. Multiple online players can even edit a map simultaneously.

name: Cut Me Deeply
summary: A vampire wakes up miles from his lair. He doesn't remember what happened or why he is in the middle of the forest. All he wants to do is go home. Now if only that clingy, beeping robot would leave him alone!

name: Cubic Light

Unlock new game modes as you progress. Make your team stronger and stronger to challenge ultimate opponents and feel the shining glory of true Champion.

Are you ready to push your limits?

Only 1% can escape through level 10! Are you up for the challenge?

Enjoy in space,
3D three-dimensional puzzle game.

name: Cuphead
summary:
A port of Cuphead that was released as a part of Tesla’s 10.0 software update. Due to the Tesla hardware of the time, the game only featured the first world of the game.

In December 2022, the port was made obsolete in certain Tesla models due to a software update which adds Steam connectivity.

name: Cubed Rally Redline

name: Cut the Head off the Snake

name: Cut Strings

During the course of the game, events will loop when time runs out and the player is able to cooperate with a past version of himself, as all the previous actions of the cursor can still be seen and influence the current session.

As such, eventually up to ten cursors will cooperate to reach the sixteenth floor, clicking boxes to open them, mounting stairs and pressing buttons simultaneously. The graphics are drawn as outlines in black and white, shown from an isometric perspective.

This edition features both recurring and new puzzles, including a deadly spear that can pin your cursor, instantly killing it, and a key to unlock a box. This version also introduces sound, unlike the first game. Apart from that, the gameplay mechanics are completely identical.

Cupcakeroo! is the most amazing and fun baking & decorating app ever. From Maverick Software, creators of all your favorite food games, now you can make cupcakes, cake pops, whoopie pies, and mini-cupcakes in the most gorgeous Retina display & iPad graphics you’ve ever seen. You won’t believe how real your treats will look!

We’ve taken everything you loved about Cupcakes! and added better graphics, even more frostings, liners and toppings, and made it easier to bake, decorate, and share the tastiest treats right from your iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad.

You can choose from 30 kinds of cupcake flavors, mix the batter from scratch by adding ingredients to the mixing bowl or start with pre-made mixes. Then choose from over 50 cupcake liners or make your own custom liner with a photo on it. Bake your cupcakes in the oven, shake to get them out of the pan, then the real fun begins- decorating!

To decorate, you have 70 frostings to choose from and 100 candy, fruit & nut toppings. Add them to your cupcake any way you want, as much as you want. When your cupcake is done, email it to a friend, save it in the fridge, post it to Facebook, or submit it to the Cupcakes Hall of Fame contest! Or put candles, sparklers or toppers on it and eat it by taking virtual bites.

Of course Cupcakeroo isn’t just about cupcakes- you can also bake cake pops, whoopie pies, and mini-cupcakes. With special flavors and batters, you’ll never run out of things to try.

The game focuses on a dark vampire cult and features a villain who becomes cursed by betraying his cult on the night of the ritual and turns into a dark creature. The player who made a deal with the devil to get rid of the curse, must hunt down cult members and curse them into his side. Meanwhile, the cultists must complete the ritual and gain vampire powers on this challenging night. But beware! When humans turn into vampires, the roles will change and the creature hunt will begin. You never know who will win in this game where teams and roles will change, where the hunter can be the prey and the prey can be the hunter. Hide in the dark, use your special powers, and survive. Not being restricted to bipedal builds, you can freely customize your mechs to include multiple heads, legs, and arms in whatever positions and angles you choose. Depending on the parts you use, the parameters will vary wildly, so you can build mechs with whatever abilities and fighting styles you wish!

Arm your custom mech to the teeth with every weapon imaginable and blast your way through oncoming enemies. Experience the heart-pounding mecha action that only your Omega Customized units can provide. Destroy enemy units, collect their parts, and customize your favorite mechs even more. Complete a variety of missions as you battle, customize, and then battle and customize some more!

This game supports online multiplayer. Up to four players can cooperate to complete story missions just like in single-player mode. Not only can you experience the rush of tackling missions with friends, but you can show off your favorite mechs you personally customized.

The object is to rotate the sections of the cube to move the colored squares so that each side of the cube contains only squares of the same color. As you might expect, it's a bit more difficult to play on a computer screen, since the game requires frequent rotation of the cube, also there is only keyboard control. So in order to have success at this game, you'll need good spatial conceptual abilities as well as a good memory and a lot of patience.

name: Cubicolor
summary: You know those cheap little tile puzzles, where you shift tiles one space at a time to try to reform a picture that has been mixed up? That's what this game is like. Move the tiles on the big square (5x5) one at a time, and try to form the pattern shown on one of the little squares (3x3) within the middle 9 tiles of the big square. The game is set up with two big squares for grueling two-player competition. Cubicolor was designed by Rob Fulop of Imagic fame. Supposedly, only 50 were produced, and each cartridge is numbered. The rarity and legend of this game make it potentially the most sought-after 2600 game in existence.

name: Curse of Babylon
summary:
The country of Babylon was once a thriving community, enjoying peace and prosperity. However, all that changed when monsters invaded the land. Eventually, the entire population was wiped out and Babylon became an enclosed area no one dared to enter. Only one brave adventurer traveled to Babylon in an attempt to destroy the evil that dominated it.

Babylon is a side-view action game with light platforming and role-playing elements. The game takes place across interconnected screens, often arranged in maze-like patterns, with vertical shafts that required climbing, dropping down, or jumping over chasms. The jump key is also used for attacking, which requires gaining momentum and repeatedly "bumping" into the enemy. There are no experience points or any type of currency, but defeating enemies may yield healing potions or better weapons and armor. These items can also be found in the numerous treasure rooms found in the game. The player is given considerable freedom as to which area to explore first, but many areas are initially blocked, requiring the player to procure a key or return with better equipment in order to defeat a stronger enemy guarding the location. [MobyGames description]

summary: Summoned by blood and born in corruption, a wicked new ally can join the holy Lamb in LOCAL CO-OP! Crusade through dungeons, slay heretics, build your cult, and seek new powers together... But that's not all!

name: Curilemu
summary: Curilemu is an adventure-horror game inspired by the myths and legends of Chilean Patagonia. Immerse yourself in a haunting world filled with Lovecraftian horrors and ancient mysteries. Fight colossal beasts and discover what is behind the plague to heal this island and restore the cosmic balance.

name: Currents
summary:
Currents is a puzzle game about guiding ships on the open ocean.
Dodge rocks, swing on whirlpools, and outrun pirates, using only ocean currents!

name: Cube Jumper

name: Cursedville
summary: A party game for 4-10 players. Play as a peasant or werewolf, cooperate with your friends and survive or hunt before all the nights are over.

Your goal is pure survival. Should any donut ever reach your cubicle: game over.

The game features numerous puzzles, challenges, and mini-games that will make your search entertaining and varied.

name: Cubric

Ready to enter a world where creativity knows no bounds? Where every block offers access to fresh adventures, mini games and challenging puzzles? Tired of traditional, multiplayer, open world games and want a new challenge? Then you’re ready for Cubric!

Cubric is the ultimate 3D world builder game that promises endless possibilities and tons of fun! Whether you're new to gaming or a seasoned explorer, Cubric offers awesome for everyone. Craft your own avatar, build towering structures, and dive into exhilarating competitions and puzzles. Discover why Cubric is the next big thing in mobile simulation and adventure gaming!

name: Cut the Birch

The year is 2416. Humanity as we know it has been mostly forgotten, as strange creatures roam the world and attack anyone they encounter.
The people of the town "Safe Haven" are able to keep these creatures at bay with the help of SPELLs - unique supernatural abilities.
A lot of technology has been lost, although scholars have managed to collect and preserve most major breakthroughs in medicine. Some technology has also been made redundant due to SPELLs.

When her friend Julia arrives, their friendship turns into a budding lesbian relationship full of happiness and multiple orgasms!

name: Cursed House 5

summary: Cursebane is a fast-paced, stylish katana-action roguelite. Step into the forest of fate, where your choices twist your journey. Empower your sword and spells as you seek out those doomed by prophecy and save them from the Curse.

They have a lifelong goal of making monsters less of a threat to society. And their research takes them to the abandoned offices of the Mall District to test a theory regarding how monsters relate to the memories of the deceased. Things go well, but then they get caught up in a corporate nightmare. Slowly breaking them down and leaving them desperately searching for a way to escape.

name: Cut It

Cursed Ones is a 1-2 player co-op horror survival game.
Play as the Crane siblings as you continue your late parents' legacy to purge the world of sinister spirits.
Track down the items used to summon the spirit by any means necessary.

Make sure you both don't die in the process.

"Curiosity killed the cat, But satisfaction brought it back."

Play as a cat as you leap and climb through a perilous labyrinth of obstacles, all to find your way back home.

name: Cursed Fables: Before the Clock Strikes
Cube Snake

name: Cult Of Blood

Fixed camera angles, dramatic cutscenes and refined tank-style controls create a tense, atmospheric experience where survival hinges on every decision. Fans of classic survival horror will feel right at home.

name: Cute Bless

name: Cursed Feed
summary:
In first-person horror game "Cursed Feed," players embark on a chilling journey with the Thornvale family as they confront a malevolent force unleashed by their own patriarch's archaeological discoveries.

Richard Thornvale, a renowned archaeologist, returns from a harrowing expedition in the Middle East with cryptic artifacts in tow, he unwittingly invites an ancient curse into their tranquil home. Soon, inexplicable phenomena plague the household, and Emily, their young daughter, becomes the focal point of the sinister presence.

With each passing night, the family is tormented by terrifying apparitions and escalating paranormal activity, leading them to unravel dark secrets buried within the walls of their own home.

As they delve deeper into the mystery, they must confront their own fears and uncover the truth behind the curse before it consumes them all. Will they break free from the grip of the past, or will they become mere echoes in the haunted halls of their own history?

name: Cube Zone
summary: Cube Zone is an unreleased space shooter by Sega which was set to be released in 1988.

name: Cursed Conundrum

You will need to investigate objects, decipher clues, and exorcise cursed items, experiencing a mix of intrigue and discovery as you try to uncover the truth behind your master teacher’s disappearance.

name: Cubio

name: Cumma Celeritate
summary: Small / medium sized temple map with a lot of monsters, built on Progs Dump v3 (already included). A remix of rd1m3 from Runner's Delight.

name: Cubic Run
summary: Switch the sides

name: Cum On! Bukkake Ranch!

It completely overhauls most aspects of the game, and contains vast amounts of new content (hundreds of hours of quests and open-world gameplay, hundreds of new items and characters, dozens of locations). OP-2 has been evolving for over a decade from many other mods such as Narodnaya Solyanka (NS), adapted into a single gigantic mod with several large overlapping storylines

name: Cult of the Lamb: Unholy Edition
Cult of the Lamb: Unholy Pack Bundle
Curse of the Dragonbeast

CotDb takes place in a grimdark alternative future where dragons have returned to Earth, use their blood to grant magical powers to humans, and uses the same dragons blood to control their minds. Humans are used as soldiers in their war against other dragons, as they seek to collect magical artifacts to grow their Draconic magic. The player takes on the role of a dragons thrall, venturing into the wilds to fight enemy thralls and retrieve treasure for their master.

Wield bouncing light orbs to shatter "cues" and unravel puzzles, all while crafting a dynamically evolving symphony influenced by your every move. Enjoy a relaxed, soothing game that constantly evolves, offering new challenges and surprises.
Ideal for brief, engaging sessions, 'Cues' converts any room into a vibrant arena of musical puzzles.

Cube Droid, inspired by Sokoban and Eggerland Mystery, offers a fun world of captivating puzzles to lose yourself in. Prepare for an out-of-this-world-journey that will challenge your mind!
