The Forgotten Culinary World, Rediscovered and Continued by You!

The food of various countries is personified as a anime, helping you in the whole process! Your favorite food will transform into a unique culinary elf, accompanying you through various difficulties and obstacles in a different world, so that you are no longer lonely.

With just one click, the Food Elf can easily sweep away evil monsters for you; One click harvest allows you to quickly obtain the resources you need! Let's talk together online and save another world, while offline, we'll lay flat and reap abundant rewards.

In addition to maintaining peace in other worlds, it can also cultivate the favorability of food elves and add combat power to you! Which type of food spirit do you like?

One handed operation, easy and casual~Hidden battles, automatic level clearing, multi line advancement saves more time! Diverse gameplay, experience different worlds.

Cube 2x1 RailFarm

summary: Step right up and test your aim in this cute and challenging shooting gallery game.

name: Cuberun
summary: CUBERUN is an Indie game, and the purpose of the game is to reach the final level and to don't hit the obstacles. After you end a level, you will get some achievements. With these achievements, you will customize your Steam profile.

summary: Cube Space is a minimalist arcade Shoot `em Up game set in space. You control a spaceship and your task is to score as many points as possible by destroying enemies and obstacles in your path.

name: Cursed Cove

Cursed Cove is an exciting 3D strategic game where players immerse themselves in a dark world of pirates and necromancy.
Your task is to capture the enemy tower using an army of skeletons that you can summon.
Strategically position your skeletons to attack the tower's cannons and archers, breaking through defensive lines and moving closer to victory.

name: Cursed House 14
summary: Banish evil spirits by combining tiles 3 in a row!

name: Cursed House 7
summary: Use your Match 3 skills against the demons!

name: Cursed House 3

As a rookie adventurer aiding a powerful Magi on their quest, you'll gradually uncover your own hidden past and fragmented memories. Amidst a backdrop of seduction and intrigue, you'll forge intimate connections with Magis, Demons, and Spirits.

Will you successfully aid the Magi, reclaim your lost memories, or will you be forever condemned to roam the labyrinthine corridors imbued with secrets?

name: Cursed Fables: A Gilded Rose - Collector's Edition
summary: Can you use your magical gifts to save the prince from a deadly fate?

name: Cube Lab

name: Cube
summary: If you are looking for a fun and adventurous game you are in the right place. The Cube game will provide you with these things.

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 5

Gastronomy meets horror in an unsettling narrative experience set in 19th-century Romagna, Italy.

Step into the shoes of a solitary writer and gourmet, inspired by the historical figure of Pellegrino Artusi, as a midnight snack spirals into the unexpected.

Cucina Stellata ✦ Starred Cuisine isn't your typical horror game: no frantic chases or cheap jump scares, but rather a thick atmosphere of tension, disturbing themes, and chilling twists that will linger in your mind long after the credits roll.

name: Cumdor no Tou: Zetsubou no Majo

name: Cubyz

name: Cursed Station

name: Cursed
summary: Cursed is a scary atmospheric walking simulator game where you'll need to watch your back and solve a mystery

name: Cute Heroes
summary: Lead your warriors to a mighty victory in the land of the zombies!

name: Cubic Gallery

name: Cucu
summary: A push-and-slide puzzle game. You win by placing a panel of the same color on the location of a colored sphere. The pushed-out block becomes the next block, so you need to think about the shape when inserting it.

name: Cubactory
summary: Cubactory is the only factory game where you truly build objects freely, transforming, blending, carving and compacting colored cubes into intricate voxel figures while automating your modular factory to meet increasingly complex orders.

name: Curses
summary: A story-driven action-adventure where you explore an eerie world, speak to its mysterious inhabitants and confront enemies. Uncover the battles those spirits face with grief, help them move on by completing their quests and guide Calvin toward the end of his own journey.

name: Cube Mind
summary: Cube Mind is a challenging first-person puzzle game with a futuristic and minimalist aesthetic. Solve interconnected rooms using logic, precision, and creativity in a world where every action matters.

name: Cult of Flies
summary: After the death of your grandmother, you start to uncover the reason behind the strange nature of her passing as well as her plans of resurrection.

name: Cursed Digilens
summary: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Use a digital camera to take photos of ghosts. Get chased by monsters. Monsters jumping towards at your screen.

name: Cult Trials: Incarnation
summary: A third-person horror adventure game set in a future corrupted world, sci-fi cult punk. Protagonist Amelia finds herself in a mysterious world, strange things are happening around her, and where our god already left us. Is She ready to face the trials and uncover the truth?

name: Cursewarden
summary: Join the cursewardens and protect society against the plague of curses in this Victorian era Action RPG. Draw curses to yourself, hack, slash, and shoot to contain them, and then turn their power against them.

name: Cursor Blast
summary: Cursor Blast is a space shooter in the style of old school SHMUPs with spaceships, heavily inspired by those from the Nintendo and Super Nintendo.

name: Cursemark
summary: Cursemark is an action-exploration roguelike where you forge unique equipment to pierce the depths of the Unknown Lands. Unlock hundreds of items and spells, then discover powerful rune synergies every run in this place beyond the edges of the world.

name: Cube Jump
summary:
Help your cube travel through space.
Jump on moving platforms and avoid falling!
Collect little cubes and unlock new characters.

name: Cult Leader Simulator
summary: Strategize, discover new cards, control risk, gather followers and increase your power. You are the leader of your own cult!

name: Cubic Cosmos
summary: Cubic Cosmos is a roguelike deckbuilder which combines fast-paced card battles with unique tower-defense gameplay. Build up your deck, construct your strategy, unlock heroes, and encounter random events. Forge your unique path ahead with every step you take!

name: Cubic Blitz
summary: Cubic Blitz is an isometric puzzle game where you control a cube and solve loads of hand-crafted levels. With the power of paint, sponges, and much more, your task is simple: PAINT THE WORLD.

name: C.U.B.E.: Clever Uber Bot Extensible
summary: In this puzzle game you need to analyze levels, line up commands and watch as C.U.B.E. executes them while moving towards the finish. Will this last forever?

name: Cute Star Heroes
summary: "Cute Star Heroes" is a game inspired by the Klonoa series and 8-bit games on the NES. Play as one of the two titular "Cute Star Heroes" -Pami, a brave blue-loving rabbit, or Lumi, a girly pink-loving cat. Travel through eight different worlds and stop Lord Hades from taking control of the universe.

name: Cube Foundry
summary: Classic Incremental Gameplay: Easy to start, with a depth that will keep you hooked as you optimize your strategy. Satisfying Progression: Feel the power grow as your production numbers explode. Mastery System: Long-term rewards for your dedication and total production.

name: Cult of Pin
summary: A Roguelike Pinball game where the tables are possesssed and it's your job to destroy them, repeatedly. Complete missions, equip upgrades and pull off the perfect shot to trigger devastating special attacks. Bumper-smashing fun all round.

name: Curyeux
summary: Dive into the mind of Lucienne, a tormented painter. Leap through emotional memories, solve puzzles where shapes deceive and emotion leads the way. A dreamlike platformer where each painting brings you one step closer to yourself.

name: Culinary Wizard
summary: A magical action platformer following the life of an apprentice chef learning to master the secrets of the culinary arts under the tutelage of a newfound teacher. Journey through magical lands, bring ingredients to life, and slay foes using kitchen tools, all in a classic 32-bit pixel art style.

name: Cursor
summary: Your friend: Jeffery, has gone missing after going to get food from the house for the mouse colony. He gets lost and now you go after him trying to rescue him.

name: Curtain Drop
summary:
This game is played by using the player's hands to create “shadow pictures” on the screen.

Instead of using common input devices such as a controller or mouse, the player actually creates shadow pictures on the screen in real space, and all operations are performed by the shadow pictures. The created shadowgraphs are captured in the game world through the camera and begin to move as characters. Different movement patterns and characteristics are automatically set for each character, and based on their performance, they engage in auto-battles with enemy characters. Character performance is determined based on the shape and size of the base shadowgraph, so the key to the game is how creative you can be in order to create powerful characters.

name: Cubescape
summary: CubeScape is a philosophical game of self-discovery. You enter a gallery called "Tesseract," but soon everything vanishes. Now you wander through bizarre cubic worlds, trying to understand what truly lies within you.

name: C.U.T.S
summary: It's an indie horror game in which a man named Ethan, passionate about collecting VHS tapes, receives a box full of them from a friend. But as he begins to watch them, he realizes he's witnessing something deeply disturbing and unsettling.

name: Curse Retold: A Hello Neighbor Tribute
summary: Curse Retold (before known as Fatal Peek) is a complete reimagining of Hello Neighbor 1, drawing heavily from the modern lore and atmosphere while adding a touch of nostalgic charm from the beloved alpha versions. Play in randomized houses against Theodore Masters Peterson, who will do everything in his power to stop you from involving yourself in whatever lies within Raven Brooks.

name: Cube Guardian: Tower Defender
summary: Cube Guardian: Tower Defender is a rogue-like tower defense game on a procedurally generated, cube-based battlefield. Protect the Nexus by strategically placing resource buildings as enemy waves intensify every 10 seconds. Earn XP to unlock upgrades and beat your high score!

name: Current
summary: Find your flow in Current, a peaceful platformer focused on combining fluid movement to elevate momentum. Breeze through atmospheric worlds in this meditative experience.

name: Cuisine Master VR
summary: Cuisine Master is a virtual reality cooking game set in a high-end restaurant, where players prepare and serve dishes from five global cuisines: French, Italian, Middle Eastern, Mexican, and Chinese.

name: Cursedland
summary: Go on a single adventure, where all the jumps and movements are of importance. You must overcome floating platforms, avoid traps and kill enemies, tearing them to pieces, to make your way through the surreal world of the game, full of fun and challenging references.

name: Cuppy Coffee Sim
summary: Run your own café, take care of your customers, procure and store your products, produce and serve your products, pay attention to your star rating, set prices as you wish and collect payments, develop, design, and decorate your café. Enjoy the view...

name: Cursed Words
summary: From letters to lunacy, Cursed Words is a roguelike chasing ever-stronger synergies. Start with simple words like BUY or THIS or GAME, then use game-altering combos to break the rules. Before long you’ll be ¼♖♙K5XNG the ⅗H♗4 out of these 83VK??7?!

name: Cut the Buttons
summary: A snip here, a cut there: avoid the bolts and please beware! Now make a trim, its time to start, make sure to keep your scissors sharp!

name: Curse of Argentum
summary: Investigate, explore and fight your way through a cursed manse to find the keys to your escape. Cast spells with the power of Argentum; manage limited resources, and navigate with a classic fixed-camera perspective while you solve puzzles and defend against cursed creatures.

name: Cuomo and the Quest for Gracie Mansion
summary: Can you beat Zohran Mamdani? You are Andrew Cuomo, disgraced former governor of New York State. Can you beat Zohran Mamdani in the New York mayoral race? Probably not. But try anyway! Six endings to discover and lots of Real Cuomo Facts to learn. Not affiliated with any political campaign or organization.

name: Cuddle Corner
summary: Meet your tiny companions in this adorable desktop pet simulation. Feed them with care, play together, and create a cozy home with colorful decorations. Whether you’re working, gaming, or on a break, spend time with these charming friends.

name: Curse of Darkness
summary: is a tense survival game in a post-apocalyptic world where the player has to collect parts of a crashed car to save himself while avoiding deadly monsters. Four different creatures roam the world, each with their own special abilities

name: Customer Support
summary:
The questions are all the same. Boring. Repetitive.

Until they’re not.

Your shift starts like any other: mop the floors, answer the phone, restock the shelves, clean the windows. But as the night wears on, the calls start getting... strange, more personal, More threatening.

name: Cubex
summary: Cubex is a horror escape room game in first person, collaborative (or not) for up to 4 players, where your objective will be to find the exit of a giant cube.

name: Culdcept Expansion
summary:
The initial 1999 PlayStation release, Culdcept Expansion, has an additional four maps for a total of 14, and also contains 360 cards but 10 of them have been replaced with new ones for balance reasons, as well as the ability to load custom maps from a memory card.

Your objective is to have collect enough magic points (MP) before your opponents do and reach the castle. You do this by controlling areas on the board with creatures that you summon. Players (called Cepters) affect each other by attacking each other's creatures with their own. Players cannot directly attack each other, but can cast spells on each other. If you lose a battle on an opponent's square, you must pay them (rent) as MPs.

name: Curse of Pirates
summary: Ahoy, matey! How about slicing up some sea beasts and sending a couple of rivals to feed the kraken? Curse of Pirates be a true action roguelike, inspired by Vampire Survivors and Hades! Set sail upon the high seas, gather ye brave crew, and stand firm against the relentless tides of foes!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven
summary: A lost God calls you from a mysterious mountain—rebuild the flock and reawaken winter to uncover the truth of the fallen lambs. Face the past before it consumes you in this full-length expansion for Cult of the Lamb.

name: Custom Fortress
summary: Custom Fortress is a community-driven Team Fortress 2 sourcemod that attempts to make TF2 as customizable as possible by removing as much hardcoded elements as possible to make it as easy as possible to create new content, implementing new convars to control every aspect of your server, and lots of new community content included is base game for you to try out including new weapons, taunts, cosmetics, and gamemodes!

name: Cursed Fables: Before the Clock Strikes - Collector's Edition
summary: What if Cinderella’s family wasn’t so evil after all?

name: Cursed House 2
summary: Cursed House 2 is a Match 3 game. Almost all of its mechanics are unique and unlike anything in our other games. The game includes 15 groups of levels. Each group comes with its own unique objective and custom power-ups designed specifically for that objective.

name: Cursed Shorts
summary: On your way home by subway, your phone keeps pushing you abnormal short videos. Before your phone runs out of battery, you need to identify them and swipe them away, otherwise, the subway will never arrive at the station.

name: Cube Shooter
summary: Cube Shooter is a top down arena shooter where players need to dodge and shoot back to pass each level. Shoot your way through levels of 'cube' like enemies who have their own unique abilities to stop you passing each level.

name: Cursed by Feedback
summary: Gerald, the mighty Boss, once terrorized heroes across the entire kingdom… until the day he faced a dreadful CEO. After receiving cruel feedback in the middle of battle, Gerald was thrown into a cursed loop, doomed to fight over and over again in search of the perfect battle.

name: Cube1 vs. Cube2
summary: Engage in an epic clash and dominate the cubic battleground! Join the fray and showcase your skills in this addictive cube game!

name: Cupcake Galaxy
summary: 80's Retro-style space game designed for kids but fun for the whole family!

name: Cube Ninja
summary: Cube Ninja is a fast pace platformer. By the power of shuriken, he could weaving through the air and piercing enemies like flash. Confront the spraying blood and blade in front, can the Cube Ninja overcomes this wild hunt?

name: Cult Vacui
summary: Cult Vacui is a horror point-and-click adventure with survival and time management elements where your choices could keep you alive... or not.

name: Cubes Go
summary: Build, Eliminate, Evolve in 3D! Experience epic block-smashing thrills! Unlock powers like Nuclear Strikes, Infinite Lives & Score Multipliers via a deep Skill Tree. Strategically upgrade, build devastating combos, and shatter cubes!

name: Cursed House 15
summary: Cursed House 15 is a new game in the series. It's new not only by number, but also in terms of gameplay mechanics. Some of these updates aren't directly visible to players but allow for more engaging Match-3 puzzle levels. However, there are also updates that players will see and appreciate.

name: Curse of Woney
summary: A Turn-Based RPG + Roguelike following a Familiar trying to free himself from a witch. Optimize your build, and sling spells until you're free.

name: Cube Cube 2
summary: "Cube Cube 2" is an immersive 3D Rubik's Cube simulator featuring various popular cube types like the classic 3x3, Pyraminx, Mirror Cube, and Megaminx. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, enjoy fun and challenges tailored to all skill levels.

name: Cuber
summary: Cuber is a low-poly endless runner game in which you have to keep an ice cube alive. There are many obstacles, as well as items that influence the effect of the obstacles. So you have to make smart decisions: do you avoid obstacles, or do you try to get rid of them with the help of the items?

name: Cutting Grass With Nail Clippers the Game
summary: A walking and exploration simulator for cutting grass with nail clippers. You cut grass with nail clippers, grow the grass, sell the grass, and buy upgrades for your clippers to cut even more grass. Cut grass at your own pace, no rush.

name: Cutout Village
summary: Cutout Village is a narrative, cozy, city-builder game in which you will have to build villages using simple and unique mechanics: cutting, folding and gluing. Restore the family home, revive your village and create spaces filled with fruit trees and histories to live!

name: Curse of Dominion
summary: Crowned for saving the king, you wield the coveted Blessing of Dominion. Command tense tactical battles, deepen companion Loyalty, evade those who would kill for your power, and watch a secret moral scale quietly reshape Elvorith’s fate.

name: Cute Nurses
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Cursed Loop
summary: Trapped in a nightmare, every death pulls you back into the same dark cycle. Test your spirit and courage as you escape the depths of a sinister mansion.

name: Cuddly Cuburt
summary: Q*Bert clone

name: Curtainfall
summary: A fast-paced action roguelike where you fight through cursed circus arenas, unlock powerful abilities mid-run, and build your own combat style with every performance.

name: Cute Girls Love Books
summary: Cute Girls Love Books is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: CubeHub
summary: Funny physical challenges. Have time to connect the figures in the correct configuration.

name: Cute Fame Highschool Days
summary: Cute Fame Highschool Days is a turn-based RPG focused on the high school life of a student residing in a fantasy world, with a large number of looming monsters

name: Cute Cute Cuties
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age. Enjoy ;-)

name: Cut That Wire
summary: Drive into a world where a Bluff and a Bomb are separated by only a small wire, tied up by a psychopath in chairs with bombs strapped to their chests, play games, vote for losers and must cut a wire, risking instant death. Test your skill. Outsmart the imposter to be the survivor.

name: Cutting Edge: Roots of Mutation
summary: Perform life-saving operations in this fast-paced surgery sim. As lizard surgeon Dr. Peri Maddock, you'll treat injuries, excise tumors, and hack corporate organs with speedy, surgical precision. The patient's life is in your claws!

name: Cubin II
summary: Cubin II is a first-person puzzle-platformer game that re-immerses you in the LGA experience. Complete the story by solving these 50 new experiments to finally escape from this terrible place.

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 7
summary: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. A physical checkup spirals into a steamy affair when Lily reveals the secrets of her open marriage to the charming and insatiable Doctor Martin. Will James catch them in the act?

name: Cubs Story:
summary: Cubs Story is a 3D idle pet game. Adopt a unique desk companion, dress them in cute outfits, and decorate cozy sceneries. With dress-up, gardening, career growth, and home design, enjoy a light, relaxing, and charming idle experience for all ages.

name: Cultic: Chapter 2
summary:
Defying death once again, you emerge from the deserted Police Station into the ravaged streets of New Grandewel. Corpses litter the roads, flames and smoke billow from nearby windows, and cultists infest every inch of the city you once protected.

Fight your way through a wide variety of new locations in a thrilling new campaign, with new weapons and enemies, a revamped dodge and tackle, a whole new soundtrack, and more! Chapter Two boasts a longer campaign with larger maps, offering an even bigger experience than the first Chapter!

name: Curse the Cursor
summary: An idle game with two opposite modes. --Parker Mode: Do not move your cursor!-- --Nonstop Mode: Move your cursor!-- Customize your game with skins, effects, and backgrounds.

name: Cute Warrior Girl
summary: The 16-year-old warrior's name is Fiora. This game is an adventure story about a young female warrior set in a medieval world.

name: Cute Warrior Girl 2
summary: Cute Warrior Girl Fiora takes on the orcs raiding the rural villages! This is a JRPG-style comedy game where you freely explore castles, forests, and villages, talk to people, read signposts, and track down the orcs’ hideouts to defeat them.

name: Cube Jumper VR
summary: Cube Jumper VR is a fast-paced, immersive VR platformer where you leap across a world of cubes, avoiding deadly lava. Collect diamonds and resources while mastering the game modes: Free Play, Time Attack, and Shooter, where you fend off enemies like spiders and drones.

name: Cult of the Yellow King
summary: A cosmic horror idle game where you build the Yellow King’s cult, spread his living mold, and click yourself hollow. Memory by memory. Scream by silent scream, as the sky blooms with eyes watching your beautiful undoing.

name: Cube Hits Corner
summary: A nostalgic, casual distraction inspired by The Office’s DVD logo scene. Track high scores while subtly influencing the bouncing image's direction. Perfect for meetings or class. Customize the visual by swapping in your own image or gif for a personal touch. Desktop can still be used while playing.

name: Cumboy in Space 2
summary: CUMBOY IN SPACE 2 is a sequel visual novel in which you will play a male character. It is a space drama in an alternate history, where you will have hot sex with beautiful women and decide the fate of the galaxy.

name: Cumboy in Space
summary: Cumboy in Space is a visual novel where you will be playing a male character. It is a space drama in an alternate history, where you will have hot sex with beautiful women and decide the fate of the galaxy.

name: Cursed Memory
summary: A psychological dark fantasy visual novel with turn-based combat. Unravel the mystery of a curse that erases memories and transforms people into demons.

name: Cursed Legacy
summary: Cursed Legacy is a 2D-pixel action rogue-lite game where you become a fallen hero and get revenge on humanity who betrayed you, and slay as many enemies as possible in one slash by Slash Dashing. The more enemies defeated in one slash, the more the reward.

name: Curse Words
summary: Curse Words is a roguelike FPS about swearing! Use your real voice to unleash powerful abilities based on your favorite swear words. Slay hordes of enemies, level up, and unlock new words and upgrades to create insane builds!

name: Curse of the Abyss
summary: Curse of the Abyss is a Traditional Roguelike with a twist. Manage your resources and explore the abyss and slay the various Guardians of the Abyss and remove the curses.

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 6
summary: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Lily and James's romantic getaway to an ocean villa takes a spicy twist when Lily seduces their handsome neighbor by the pool. Will James be content to watch the show from the sidelines?

name: Cuckold Sex: Episode 4
summary: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. James dares Lily to seduce Melissa at the spa, but she takes things further by surrendering to a hot stranger’s advances in the sauna. Will James welcome his wife’s boldness?

name: Curtains The Clown
summary: Curtains The Clown is a compact 2D adventure with multiple possible outcomes. Use simple platforming mechanics like wall jumps and double jumping to guide Curtains through a treacherous world in search of a way to continue (or end) his journey. Hidden away in seemingly unreachable places are 6 items that hold the keys to various exits. Find and bring an item to its corresponding NPC/world object to discover what fate will become of our clown friend.

name: Cummon
summary: Catch and evolve over 186 unique CumMon! Turn based combat meets bodily fluids. Can you raise the ultimate team of cum spewing, shit slinging and piss blasting monsters?

name: Curupira the Forest Guardian
summary: Join Curupira, the legendary guardian of the forest, and heroes inspired by Brazilian folklore to protect nature! ★ Dodge, crouch, and jump to avoid obstacles! ★ Defend the Forest from Threats! ★ Unlock new characters and abilities! ★ Characters inspired by Brazilian Folklore!

name: Cumming of Age
summary: A young man prepares for his "Coming of Age" ceremony by getting blessings of the ancient Greek goddesses. A rich lewd visual novel over 125.000 words about Greek mythology.

name: Cube Dungeon
summary: Trapped in the mysterious Cube Dungeon, you must fight, loot, and survive through dark halls and deadly enemies. This action RPG blends old-school handcrafted style with unique progression systems and hardcore mechanics. Can you escape?

name: Cursed Presence
summary: Cursed Presence is a first-person psychological horror, paranormal, and survival horror story where grief opens the door to the supernatural. Explore, solve puzzles, and escape from ghostly entities, guided only by a bell that detects evil and defending yourself with limited resources.

name: Cuzuco
summary: Challenge yourself and demonstrate your precise high-speed hand control to help our little armadillo get back home as fast as possible in this fair but unforgiving platformer game.

name: Cut the Grass: Farm Defense Survival
summary: Cutting grass is just the beginning. Explore, gather loot, upgrade your farm and survive night attacks. Fight monsters, defend your base, and last as long as you can in this day-night survival loop!

name: Cult of Shadows
summary: Uncover the secrets of Bel Noa. Fight hordes of cultists and the Myhos they summon. Defeat fearsome beasts, upgrade your character, acquire and enchant weapons. Die and return stronger to face the Cult of Shadows.

name: Cubic Annihilation
summary: Command cubic armies in a classic explosive RTS but with a twist. Inspired by games like C&CG, SC2, & Total Annihilation. Build your loadout, deploy across land, sea, and air, and outwit your rivals in fast-paced tactical warfare.

name: Cubuleto
summary: Step into the world of Cubuleto, an isometric grid puzzle game where your goal is simple: find the path from start to finish. Easy to learn but challenging to master, each puzzle tests your logic and creativity. Can you find the way through?

name: Cute Mold
summary: Cute Mold is a mold growth and evolution simulation. The mold gets energy for the void space around it, so the mold that has more voids will get more energy. Molds cannot interact or damage each other, evolutionary selection goes only by competing for space.

name: Cursed Frontier
summary: A 2D platformer shooter with a somber linoleum-inspired art style, where you’ll face funeral creatures in a haunting Wild West setting.

name: Current: The Flow
summary: Electricity changed our world forever, yet it remains fragile. We must handle it with care, or else we might just lose the wonders that it brings.

name: Cultivation Magic World
summary: "Cultivation Magic World" is a single-player RPG blending treasure hunting, cultivation, and idle play. With various classes and physiques, you can tame spirit beasts, collect gear, and advance your realm. Log in to battle automatically and enjoy the fun of growth and collection.

name: Cult of the Dragon
summary: Cult of the Dragon takes place in a fantasy world that is currently experiencing peace. But the imprisonment of the player character is just the beginning of a change, as evil begins to creep from the shadows of the realm, and into the light. The player has the choice of 10 different characters from 10 different classes. The classes are Hero, Warrior, Mage, Priest, Paladin, Thief, Archer, Warlock, Monk, and Samurai. Each class has it's own unique set of weapons, along with special skills and magical spells. This means each class will play different, and each time playing is a new experience. You can play as a Witch or Wizard. Or you can play as a Samurai. The choice is yours.

name: Cultivation Story: Infinite Sword Realm
summary: Cultivation Story: Infinite Sword Realm is an action-packed roguelike deckbuilder rooted in Cultivation and Chinese mythology, where every action costs you lifespan. Enter the realm of Swords, balance power and mortality as you climb the path to immortality.

name: Curse of The Lineage
summary: Curse of the Lineage is an isometric puzzle roguelike where you navigate shifting grounds filled with lost souls, powerful charms and endless secrets. Unravel your bloodline’s dark past as you solve evolving puzzles and fight to break the family curse.

name: Cuckold Life Simulator
summary: Cuckold Life Simulator is a story about paying enough attention to your other half or she will find someone else. An office slave named Slavik (Slavek) comes home early one day and catches his wife and her new fitness trainer having sex.

name: Cure: A Hospital Simulator
summary: Manage an ER during the apocalypse, solo or with friends online: diagnose patients, design and grow your hospital, and defend against the undead while treating the living. Integrate with Twitch chat for even more fun!

name: Cursed
summary:
Cursed is a short black and white horror visual novel in which you explore your childhood town of Samhain with your friend, Ellen, in order to exorcise the curses that plague it.

Equipped with a small book of folk tales, which may hide the secrets of ridding the town of curses for good, you and Ellen must find and eliminate these curses without becoming cursed yourself.

name: Cursifix
summary:
A letter arrived at the grand cathedral from a small village in the western lands, pleading for aid. They wrote that the villagers had fallen under a terrible curse. It's turned people into lumps of flesh.

Father had warned me that it might be something dreadful... Yet what kind of servant would I be, if I turned my back on those in need?

name: Curse the Cursor
summary: Curse the Cursor is a bullet hell roguelike where your mouse fights through a corrupted digital dungeon. Collect powerful items and weapons to fight back against the increasing infection… but be careful not to pick up too many curses.

name: Cursed Legacy: Story of Faylinawa
summary:
Play as Jock, a mageblade struck by a dark curse. With his loyal companion Shinky, he sets out on a quest to find a healer who can break the evil consuming him.
Across perilous lands and against terrifying foes, they will discover that lifting the curse may demand a sacrifice greater than anything they had anticipated.

name: Cube Kabaam
summary: Mysterious artefacts of unknown origin have appeared throughout the universe. Due to recent events, central command is not leaving anything to chance. A disposal crew has been assembled to locate and destroy the cubes, wherever they might.

name: Cubixx
summary: Use your laser to cut away the surfaces of a mysterious cube and free the energy within. Cutting longer lines and crossing multiple cube surfaces gives you bigger combos, but at far greater risk.

name: Cultivation
summary: CULTivation is a chill farming-sim about summoning souls, managing your willpower, and gathering resources to reach Ascension. Sleep to reset the world's resources, wake to progress, and repeat, until you transcend and Ascend into a new dimension.

name: Cut It!
summary: Cut It! – Slice Your Way to Victory!

name: Cube Attack
summary: Simple game where a small blue cube in his world needs to escape and find a way out. Unfortunately, it wouldn't be easy. A lot of hostile cubes of other (a bit aggressive) colors want to reach him and break our cube apart. Each time levels are getting more complicated: more enemies, more mechanics and only one exit.

name: Cute Techno Slayer: Re Seele
summary: "Seele," the protagonist who is a customizable Sex Bot, fights against hordes of enemies called "Shadows." The enemies and maps are randomized, ensuring that each game is different, and the content is pornographic.

name: Curvid Nurntine and the Black Vaccine
summary: Curvid Nurntine and the Black Vaccine is a gritty cyber-noir point and click adventure. A degenerate private investigator, a missing girl and a suspiciously mandatory vaccine all coalesce in this unfathomably horrific conspiracy.

name: Cube Fight
summary: Cube Fight is a shooting game with skills to aid in battle in different maps as a erm cube

name: Cucu
summary: Unlock skills and battle other players in this 2D FPS arena shooter. In bullet hell-like conditions, combine attributes to create your combat style and face powerful opponents. Team up or compete in real-time multiplayer mode to prove you're the strongest and survive until the end

name: Cursebound
summary: Cursebound is a roguelite ‘reverse tower defense’ game where you recruit and evolve a party of powerful creatures. Shape the battlefield, harness unique synergies, and master deep RPG mechanics to survive endless cursed cycles. Strategize, adapt, and break the curse!

name: Curse of Yggdrasil
summary: Rebuild the world tree Yggdrasil as the last surviving viking in this tower-defence and simulator game!

name: Cult of the Lamb: Arcade Edition
summary: The apple arcade version of Cult of the Lamb. It contains every major update and DLC expansion. It also has exclusive follower skins and decorations.

name: Cues: Creator Update
summary: Creator mode lets you build anything you want with cubes. From tiny models… to living-room fortresses.

name: Cursflip
summary: Change your real Windows cursor, make it huge, collect hundreds of rare cursors, trade them on the Market and dominate clicker leaderboards!

name: Cute Bonfire
summary: Step into the warm world of Cute Bonfire, a charming pixel-art puzzle game set inside a fireplace. Take control of a little fire spirit that moves tile by tile, pushing charcoal pieces to light up the bonfires. With 30 levels of gradually increasing difficulty, delightful visuals, and a cozy, relaxing atmosphere, Cute Bonfire is perfect for casual players who love the satisfaction of solving puzzles.

name: Cubio
summary: Navigate through an atmospheric space tunnel, avoid incoming cubes and collect special ones to increase your score. The pace gradually rises and the color theme shifts over time, creating an immersive and minimal reflex experience.

name: Cute Finders
summary: Your mission starts now! Objective? Find the subtle, silly, and sneaky differences between the two images displayed!

name: Cult of Five
summary: Cult of Five is a dark, turn-based roguelike deckbuilder where you choose one of five cursed characters, battle deadly creatures, upgrade your deck, and shape your destiny in a haunting mystical world.

name: Curse Chapter: Dawnthief
summary: Plunder all the treasure worth taking from the exotic wilderness with your band of rogues. Jump, kick and sling your chain mace to smash and climb your way through any obstacle. Face off against beasts and hopeful heroes that rise up to stop you.

name: Cunning Crooks
summary: A fast-paced, class-based multiplayer heist game where you sneak, stun and steal more loot than your rivals in 15 minutes. Make too much noise? Deadly AI security will crash the party.

name: Cultivator
summary: A short, narrative-driven experience that combines intense music visualizers with a mysterious, atmospheric world. All on a tiny yellow handheld. You are a scout sent to explore and help an alien planet after intercepting a strange signal.

name: Cult of Lily
summary:
Cult of Lily, an open-world/dating sim adult game.

In this game you're a futa girl, a very popular singer known as "Lily" who, after a traumatizing event, decide to lay low and decide to enter an academy to try to have a normal life.

Spend your time as you want, you can raise your stat to meet new people, or spend some time together with your friend to deepen your bond and eventually become more than friend, or you can just explore the city, who know what'll you find.

name: Cubettiny
summary: Cubettiny is a fast-paced 2.5D arcade game where you guide a sad blue cube through low-poly levels filled with obstacles, traps, and power-ups. Collect cubes, complete chains, unlock hidden paths, use power-ups, and push through each stage to bring order back to Numeria!

name: Cube Game Server Boss
summary: Feel the thrill of running you own cube game server! Experience the journey of building your server from the ground up by upgrading gamemodes, hiring staff, and more!

name: Cururu: Whispers of the Forest
summary: After the fall of humanity, nature blooms. In a Naturepunk vision of Brazil rooted in ancestral spirit, follow the journey of Cururu, a young frog imbued with sacred water powers, as he purifies biomes and explores folklore in a tale of healing and redemption.

name: Curse of the Ethereal Dragon
summary: Adventure to the strange and remote town of Cliffside to investigate a mysterious curse. Meet eccentric characters, face unusual foes, and collect unique items as you climb the snowy mountains to discover the cause.

name: Currents of War
summary: A turn-based strategy merchant tycoon.

name: Cube Dodger 3D
summary: Cube Dodger 3D is a fast, neon arcade runner. Slide along a glowing highway, dodge smarter and faster cubes, charge your shield, unlock ships, roads and enemy skins, and chase brutal score-based Steam achievements

name: Curse of Silence
summary: Curse of Silence was an action-RPG along the lines of early Zelda games.

name: Curly Puzzle: World Heritage
summary:
Spin to connect! Let your brain travel the world.
— A new rotating puzzle brain-training game themed on World Heritage —

name: Cube Party
summary: Cube Party is a delightfully funny multiplayer co-op puzzle adventure! Team up with friends to conquer clever levels, solve puzzles, and find your way through—all packed with unexpected, laugh-out-loud moments along the way. Jump in and start the fun at your next game party!
